column4: is it possible to remote desktop my ubuntu computer from my Windows XP computer?
if i want to set up my ubuntu computer as a file server, is the best way to go FTP or Samba?
depends on who's going to talk to it.. and how you're going to use it
SLART: just a few home windows xp machines via LAN and over the internet
I use samba on my linux server to share files with both windows boxes and linux boxes
sounds like a job for samba
is samba difficult to set up?
not very.. I think there is some kind of web-setup available.. SWAT or sometihng
can samba work with macs? i do have a macbook although it isn't at all necessary that it can access the server
you can always check at samba.org they probably have some kind of FAQ
